main_definition: Occurring often or at expected intervals; consistent or habitual.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Following a predictable pattern or schedule consistently
meanings_and_examples.example: He takes his regular morning jog every day.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having equal sides and angles, not irregular
meanings_and_examples.example: A square is a shape with four regular sides of the same length.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not varied or different; conforming to a standard
meanings_and_examples.example: They prefer regular milk rather than flavored alternatives.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Accepted as normal, usual, or expected in terms of frequency, quantity, appearance, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: Going to the gym regularly can help maintain a healthy lifestyle.
